Qualifications: Bachelorâ€™s degree in a relevant field (e.g., Statistics, Engineering, Mathematics, Business) 4 years of proven experience in digital marketing, data analysis and interpretation Familiarity with e-commerce ecosystem and understanding of digital marketing channels (Google, Meta, Tiktok, RTB etc.) Hands on experience on Google measurement tools (GA4 etc.), mobile measurement partners (Adjust and/or Appsflyer) Hands on experience on data visualization tools, particularly Looker Studio Strong knowledge of Excel, gsheet Good communication and presentation skills, with the ability to translate complex data into actionable insights Understanding of big data environment (preferably BigQuery) is a plus Familiarity with machine learning techniques and predictive modeling is a plus Experience with Google Tag Manager is a plus Strong analytical and problem-solving skills Strong command of written and verbal English Job Description: Execute in-depth analysis of digital marketing campaigns, user behavior, and app performance. Work closely with digital marketing team to understand campaign objectives and provide analytics support Execute A/B tests and analyse test results to improve campaign effectiveness and conversion rate Develop dynamic dashboards to track KPIs in order to provide actionable recommendations for optimizing digital marketing efforts and improving overall performance Conduct ad-hoc analysis to support digital marketing team for data-driven decision making Utilize statistical methods and tools to interpret data (patterns, anomalies, opportunities etc.) and generate actionable insights Collaborate with IT and data analytics teams to ensure data accuracy Manage the implementation process of tracking tags for digital marketing tools/channels Create easy to understand presentations to describe analytical findings and its impacts on digital marketing overall performance In our journey which is driven with our goal of becoming the first choice as the trustedretailer for tailored solutions in a tech-driven world, we are growing rapidly with more than 98 stores today in Turkey. With the strength of MediaMarktSaturn Retail Group as the number one consumer electronics retailer in Europe, we bring technology together with our customers and make their lives easier with the services we offer.If you are a person who likes to think, speak with data and take action, it is time to join us! Sustainable growth is possible with equal opportunities and different perspectives. As MediaMarkt Turkey, we take care to avoid any discrimination such as race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, disability status. We think that all candidates who apply to us should have transparent, fair and equal rights. By trying to be a role model in our sector, we believe in the power of diversity and inclusion which help us to grow together. At Mobven, we are passionate about creating exceptional mobile solutions. Established in 2012, our company has evolved from a startup into an award-winning mobile technology company with offices in Istanbul. Mobven has been awarded as Turkeyâ€™s fastest growing top 50 tech companies by Deloitte, 4 years in a row. We continue our operations as a subsidiary of Payten, the payment solutions arm of Asseco, the 6th largest software house in Europe. If you are self-motivated and constantly bear in mind how to add value to a companyâ€™s future and its products and services, then, we are looking for individuals like you with the ambition to be game changers in the industry and to create cutting edge mobile solutions for our multinational clients. About the Role: We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Senior Data Scientist to join our team. This role requires a blend of advanced analytical skills and practical machine learning experience to drive impactful insights and innovations for our clients. Key Responsibilities: â€¢ Design, develop, and deploy machine learning models and algorithms. â€¢ Collaborate with client teams, and engineering teams to integrate machine learning solutions into production environments. â€¢ Analyze and interpret complex data sets to identify trends and patterns. â€¢ Perform model validation, tuning, and performance monitoring. â€¢ Lead data science projects from concept to deployment. â€¢ Mentor junior data scientists and provide technical guidance. Required Skills and Experience: â€¢ Advanced degree (Masterâ€™s or PhD) in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Mathematics, Data Science, Machine Learning, Statistics, or related field. â€¢ 3-5 years of experience in data science and machine learning roles, with experience in key supervised/unsupervised learning and deep learning techniques (eg, ANN, CNN) Ideally experience in NLP Transformers, and in Transformer architecture Experience in model evaluation and validation techniques, including LIME, SHAP and surrogate models â€¢ Strong programming skills in Python, R, or similar languages. â€¢ Hands-on experience with machine learning libraries such as TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, or Scikit - learn. â€¢ Knowledge of SQL and experience with relational databases. â€¢ Familiarity with machine learning engineering and deployment practices. â€¢ Excellent analytical and problem-solving abilities. â€¢ Effective communication skills and ability to work collaboratively. Preferred Skills: â€¢ Experience with cloud computing platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure). â€¢ Proficiency in big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Spark). â€¢ Background in NLP, computer vision, or time series analysis. â€¢ Experience with data visualization tools and techniques. What We Offer: A dynamic and innovative working environment, Competitive compensation package, Health insurance, Generous paid time off and flexible work arrangements, Access to cutting-edge tools and technologies, Opportunities for professional growth and development. About BiTaksi: We are BiTaksi, Turkeyâ€™s leading taxi-hailing app. Over the past eleven years, we have grown from a small startup with big dreams to a big startup that touches peopleâ€™s lives every second, providing them with a safe, easy, and modern transportation solution. This has all been possible due to our creative & analytical thinking to develop marketing strategies with a dedicated team right here in our office. Company Vision: Our vision is to transform the way people move by leveraging cutting-edge technology and creating seamless experiences for both riders and drivers. We aim to be the preferred transportation platform of choice, setting new industry standards and reshaping urban mobility. Why Choose BiTaksi: Impactful Work: By joining BiTaksi, you will have the opportunity to work on projects that have a direct impact on the lives of millions of people. Your contributions will help shape the future of transportation and make a difference in the way people navigate their daily lives. Innovation and Technology: At BiTaksi, we embrace innovation and leverage the latest technology to create user-centric solutions. As a Senior Performance Marketing Specialist / Executive you will be part of a dynamic team that pushes boundaries and explores new possibilities in the transportation industry. To join us as a Senior Performance Marketing Specialist / Executive youâ€™ll need: Bachelor's degree in a related field 4+ years of experience at Performance Marketing, especially in App Marketing area Good knowledge of MMP tools, preferably in Adjust Understanding of marketing in detail: user acquisition, re-engagement, retention, etc Excellent analytical skills and leverage data, metrics, analytics, and consumer behavior trends to drive actionable insights & recommendations Proactive and initiative taker Hunger to learn and relearn Enthusiasm for working in an imperfect dynamic startup environment Experience in the Mobile technology / technology sector would be an advantage Strong written, verbal communication skills & inter-personal skills both in English You will: Define our digital marketing strategy in line with our marketing agenda and growth objectives Experience with launching and scaling app and display marketing across networks such as Google, Meta, TikTok and others Create, manage and deploy performance, display, mobile and social media marketing campaigns and optimizing daily to reach success metrics Overall maintenance of mobile attribution tools such as Adjust, Appflyers etc Ability to organize re-marketing, targeting processes and using necessary tools in line with campaign objectives Design and conduct rigorous A/B experiments to test digital communication assets In-depth understanding of social media platforms, their protocols and analytics Monitoring and reporting weekly & monthly digital communication Collaborate cross-functionally between marketing, engineering, product and data science teams What we offer? Open communication, teamwork and strong company culture of continuous development Private health insurance (family included) Meal card Transportation allowance We care about your wellbeing; free psychological counseling, legal advice, financial advice etc. Team and company activities for motivation Discounted gym membership In BiTaksi weâ€™re always evolving. If youâ€™re interested in challenges to look for new ways to improve BiTaksi growth strategies everyday, join our dynamic team as a Senior Performance Marketing Specialist / Executive . About ING Think Forward! Our purpose is to empower people to stay a step ahead in life and in business. We are an industry recognized strong brand with positive recognition from customers in many countries, a strong financial position, Omni-channel distribution strategy and international network. If you want to work at a place where we believe that you can make a difference by using the latest Analytics techniques to generate data-driven approaches and conversational products and solve real business challenges, please read on. ING Analytics ING Analytics is a new unit responsible for realizing this vision for ING, differentiating ING as a leader in data-driven organization, within the banking sector and beyond. The team consists of a number of Global Analytics Centre of Excellences around the bankâ€™s key capabilities (such as Pricing, Risk Management, Financial Crime, Customer Intelligence and People Analytics.) as well as strong coordination areas around data management, technology, customer journey, UX, as well as external partnerships. COO Analytics- Customer Dialogue Analytics You will be part of the COO Analytics Tribe, which delivers generative AI , AI and advanced analytics capabilities to all ING countries. Specifically, you will help creating innovative-scalable-data driven solutions in the space of Customer Dialogue Analytics. You proactively work with teams to implement these solutions across the organization. You will work collaboratively with an extended group of stakeholders, including global and local Retail Contact Center teams. Your mission will be to ensure the improvement of our products with a team and supporting all ING countries in reaching their targets by providing smart advanced analytics solutions, to strengthen ING leadership in digitalization & support our 40 million customers. We work in a fun and creative environment, and weâ€™re dedicated to bringing out the best in both our relations and our projects, ranging from enhancing our virtual assistants in production via innovative NLP techniques sush as Generative AI and Large Language Models, to building speech analytics use cases across all the countries ING operates in. The opportunity As a Natural Language Processing (NLP) Data Scientist, you will be joining the global ING Analytics organization and will partner with Machine Learning (ML) Engineers and Customer Journey Experts to design and implement leading-edge conversational AI products, such as virtual assistants and Retrieval Augmented Generation systems using LLMs. As an NLP data scientist, you understand business needs, perform data preprocessing and analysis, and build machine learning models and/or design and implement NLP models using managed LLM services for speech and text data to improve our conversational platform and ING contact center agentsâ€™ efficiencies globally. A day in the life of an NLP Data Scientist After your morning coffee, you stand up with data engineers to understand the best scalable way to get models to run in production, leading the way in how to approach a modeling problem and to turn data into business value. You talk to the business to convince them that your solution has value and you incorporate their feedback into your modeling pipeline. After a lunch break with colleagues, you think of a new technology youâ€™d like to try out. You start investigating and write it up for the next experimentation day or demo. At the end of the afternoon, you finalize some comments other colleagues from the ING Analytics Community had on your latest blog post or start building your presentation for the next conference you will be presenting at. As a Data Scientist working for ING Global Analytics, youâ€™ll never get bored with many experienced and skilled colleagues around you, the freedom to innovate, and to not only use open source and cloud managed service tooling, but also contribute and teach about them. You Will Be Responsible For Design and implementation of solutions using Generative AI and LLM technologies Developing production level NLP models Working with ML Engineers to productionize your developed NLP models Using the cutting-edge NLP and conversational AI frameworks and technologies such as Large Language Models and Generative AI Following best practices in developing ML code and ML software tests Making design and technical decisions for conversational systems projects at ING Analytics. Supporting local teams in several countries and their projects. Participating in design, analysis, and interpretation of business hypotheses and exploring datasets. Recommending ideas to the business based on data. Assisting your model users to understand the data science principles and when needed explaining the model behavior and possible corrective actions. Contributing to strengthening the data analytics capability within the team. About you Always thinking a step ahead and never satisfied with the status quo Enthusiasm for helping others to be successful and a talent for taking it on and making it happen You have a learning attitude. Not only to master new technologies and programming languages, but also on the interpersonal level. We are looking for Snowflake Data Engineer join our fast-paced and self-accountable team that delivers enterprise-level products for local and global markets. You will work with IT consultants, delivery managers, DevOps engineers, QA teams, BE, FE, and mobile developers to deliver best-in-class digital products. Letâ€™s develop your future together, where you can code, grow, and inspire others. What will you do? In this role, you will be at the forefront of our data migration initiatives, playing a critical part in transforming and modernizing data infrastructure. Your primary responsibility will be migrating on-premises solutions to cloud-based solutions. This role demands a blend of technical expertise, effective communication, and meticulous data validation to ensure seamless and successful migrations. As a Data Engineer, you will collaborate closely with business owners, understanding their requirements and keeping them informed about the migration progress. You will also be responsible for validating the migrated data, ensuring that it meets our high standards of accuracy and completeness. This involves performing data quality checks and resolving any issues that emerge during the migration process. Your analytical skills and attention to detail will be essential in maintaining the integrity of our data. This role offers an exciting opportunity to work on cutting-edge data migration projects within a dynamic and collaborative environment. Should be able to understand the Db concepts and difference between MPP and SMP system. Understanding and experience in ETL Tools will be a big plus Able to think analytically, use a systematic and logical approach to analyze data, problems, and situations. Should be able to drive the day-to-day tasks in alignment with the project plan and collaborate with client to accomplish milestones as per plan. Job Description Major accountabilities: Validation Expert -Support Product Steward in maintaining the process control strategy. Translate applicable process parameters and the process control strategy into a focused validation plan for process validation. Provide technical expertise and facilitate establishment of Quality Risk Assessment (as needed). Support site validation planning by writing and maintaining master plans for processes, cleaning, packaging processes and ongoing verification for processes and cleaning (as applicable). Support process validation lifecycle activities by ensuring a state of control is maintained through ongoing process verification (OPV). Ensure that appropriate variables are identified for on-going monitoring as a contributor to quality risk management activities. Work in close collaboration with development organization (or sending site) for technical transfers and new product launches to ensure that knowledge is transferred, control strategies are appropriate, risks are analyzed and controlled and to ensure that commercial processes are validation readyScientist MSAndT -Comply with applicable GxP regulations, SOPs, HSE, ISEC And other Novartis Guidelines in the laboratory and, -Maintain up-to-date documentation of laboratory work carried out including documentation storage and archiving. Contribute to and maintain lab instructions, SOPs, templates. Support, qualification and calibration of lab / pilot equipment with accompanying documentation, schedule and perform routine maintenance. Contribute to the evaluation of new equipment. Design, execute and document experiments (formulation / analytical tests etc.) for products assigned in the context of process transfer, process improvement and process validation. Prepare and review appropriate GxP documentation including change requests. Participate in Tech Transfer activities from laboratory to industrial scale, support validation activities. Identify improvement options of current processes, propose business cases. Reporting of technical complaints / adverse events / special case scenarios related to Novartis products within 24 hours of receipt -Distribution of marketing samples (where applicable) Key Performance Indicators Meet established validation milestones according to approved validation plans. Audit and inspection outcomes as a measure of validation compliance with global regulatory expectations. Timing and quality of technical reports. Timely and successful implementation of transfer activities (e.g. lab-to-lab transfer in launches). Minimum Requirements Work Experience: Fix-its/Turnarounds. Project Management. Collaborating across boundaries. Operations Management and Execution. Skills Assembly Language. Change Control. Chemical Engineering. Chemistry. Continual Improvement Process. Cost Reduction. Data Analytics. Electronic Components. General Hse Knowledge . Including Gdp. Knowledge Of Capa. Knowledge Of Gmp. Lean Manufacturing. Manufacturing (Production). Manufacturing Process. Pharmaceutics. Process and Cleaning Validation. Process Control. Process Engineering. Risk Management. Root Cause Analysis (Rca). Scheduler. Six Sigma. Sop (Standard Operating Procedure). Languages English. Show more Show less

Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. TEKNOSA IS BEAUTIFUL WITH YOU! We bring together technology and happiness at Teknosa. Knowledge on IDOC Error Monitoring / Issue Fixing , Analysis on Job Failures and bug fixing. Our Applications We Think You May Be Interested In: Hybrid working model Opportunity to work remotely for 1 month Birthday leave Ergonomics & internet support Multisport support Studio Live online wellbeing application membership TeknoLife activities and Teknosa Clubs (dance, theatre, photography) Teknosa Volunteers - social responsibility projects Teknosa Academy - online and in-class training Thank you for your interest in our job posting! Ready to learn more about us? We were founded in 2010 with a dynamic and agile start-up spirit. The trust of around 30 million customers and 250,000 sellers has made us the first decacorn in Turkey. Our success is backed by renowned investors such as Alibaba, General Atlantic, Softbank, Princeville Capital and several sovereign wealth funds. In 2022, we opened our first dedicated international office in Berlin and expanded to Amsterdam, Luxembourg and London. And that's just the beginning! Tech at the root We believe that technology is the driver and e-commerce is the outcome. Thanks to the dedication of our team, we have become one of the top 5 e-commerce companies in EMEA and one of the fastest growing worldwide. We currently deliver over 1.5 million parcels daily to 27 countries. Growth is in our DNA As a young and dynamic company, we are constantly growing and expanding. With Trendyol Tech, one of the leading R&D centres, Trendyol Express, the fastest growing delivery network, Dolap, the largest platform for second-hand goods, and Trendyol Go, our instant food and grocery delivery service, we are gearing up to become the world's leading e-commerce platform. Focused on positive impact Our vision goes beyond business success. We strive to make a sustainable and positive impact on our customers, business partners, and society. By digitizing merchants and SMEs, helping businesses grow, and promoting women's economic empowerment, we are dedicated to creating a better future. ABOUT THE TEAM If you are a techie, you belong in our Technology Team that builds scalable, high-performance platforms for our customers using up-to-date and efficient technologies. We are all working with the same purpose: To create a positive impact in our ecosystem by enabling commerce through technology. YOUR MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES Data Science department in Trendyol consists of 90+ talented data scientists organized under several domains. Each domain is autonomous and empowered to experiment with new ideas while cross-collaboration is strongly encouraged with horizontal structures. As part of the Discovery domain which plays a central role for growth and expansion in Trendyol, you will improve and innovate the personalization effort and recommendation models to create meaningful impacts. Develop recommendation systems, improve user experience by building an exclusive content ecosystem and create an industry leading personalization domain. Apply best practices for working with ML-Ops infrastructure, improve models and infrastructure to optimize recommendation performance. Work with stakeholders throughout the organization to identify opportunities for leveraging company data to drive business solutions. Synthesize methodology and data into actionable business strategy and communicate findings to engineering and management teams as driving business impact. QUALITIES WE ARE LOOKING FOR Bachelor's or Master's Degree (PhD is a plus) preferably in Industrial Engineering, Computer Science, Statistics, with 3+ years of experience as a Data Scientist or Machine Learning Engineer. Experience in applied data science and a wide range of data science stack of algorithms and models. Knowledge about recommendation and personalization domain is a big plus. Good knowledge of python or other programming language. Experience in one or more of the libraries such as Scikit-learn, PyTorch and TensorFlow is a plus. Good knowledge of SQL and familiarity with best practices. Strong analytical skills with a data driven approach. Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English. Experience with e-commerce or self-service business models is a big plus. The experience range for this position is suitable for specialist/senior specialist and executive/manager (non-team management) roles. JOIN US AND, Take responsibility from day one and develop your skills with a talented and diverse international team. Experience open communication, flexibility, and a start-up spirit in our unique culture. Tackle big challenges in e-commerce with Agile practices and encourage growth by learning from mistakes. Join creative and focused teams that prioritize collaboration and problem-solving. Access our extensive training platform for continuous learning and personal growth. Benefit from the support of a global team of experts with mentoring and professional development opportunities. Focus on talent and potential, not just job titles. Connect with teammates regardless of physical distance through events, meetings, and social activities. Enjoy competitive benefits such as Trendyol shopping budget, central and international office locations, and top-of-the-line technical equipment. Find the right balance between flexibility and team bonding with our hybrid working model and the opportunity for a two-month working from abroad program. We're looking forward to receiving your application! We embrace a hybrid working model that seamlessly blends the best of both worldsâ€”remote productivity and the collaborative energy of our vibrant offices. Every month, we gather at our offices once to work side by side, fostering in person communication and embracing the camaraderie that fuels our team spirit. These sessions are crucial for teamwork in solving complex issues, socializing, learning from each other, and experiencing our culture. Each division has a pre-set optional office day each week. Based on our preferences, we come together at our offices at our discretion as an opportunity to feel more team spirit, immerse in our culture, and familiarize ourselves with our way of workings. We offer the opportunity for a two-month full remote work program, allowing you to work from abroad, during the summer period (July to August). This working model applies to our hybrid job postings; on-site roles require being based in an office work environment. Discover more about our #LifeatTrendyol and our culture on our Website, LinkedIn and YouTube channels. At Trendyol, we believe in the power of an inclusive workplace. We value diversity and believe that every team member contributes to our vibrant culture. Our platform is for everyone, and so is our workplace. We encourage the representation and amplification of diverse voices in our business, as it allows us all to thrive, contribute, and shape the future together. Show more Show less

We believe that our employees are the foundation of our success and the source of our strength. Our vision is to become Turkey's most valuable and preferred industrial company that champions equality in the workplace. Join us in shaping the future of the automotive industry at Ford Otosan! What awaits you in this role? To ensure that daily engineering changes are implemented with minimal downtime and to keep the product tree up-to-date and accurate in order to achieve the factory manufacturing targets. To coordinate engineering changes on the production line by aligning all related stakeholders, including Product Development (PD), Product Verification Testing (PVT), Material Handling, Supply Chain, and Inventory. To perform all system setups during engineering changes and to publish setup reports weekly. To act as the core coordinator between Product Development, Purchasing, Material Planning & Logistics, Assembly, Paint Shop, Welding areas, and other related teams to implement engineering changes effectively. To minimize obsolete parts after engineering change implementation by ensuring that the obsolete stock report is published weekly to all relevant units, and to implement the Scrap Approval Process for parts that will become obsolete. To organize weekly engineering change meetings, to publish the list of participants, and the decisions made. To publish a weekly list of engineering changes expected within the next two months. To verify the inventory and Bill of Materials (BOM) usage per vehicle, and to coordinate the necessary controls and optimization to reduce factory inventory and minimize obsolete, non-moving, or slow-moving stocks What are we looking for in this position? Bachelorâ€™s degree in industrial engineering or management engineering. Minimum of 2 years of experience in Supply Chain & Logistics. Project Management and Coordination is preferable. Proficiency in English Technical & Behavioural Skills and Competencies A motivated and proactive team player with the ability to work independently. Results-oriented with a strong inclination towards taking initiative and employing a solution-oriented approach. Demonstrates strong follow-up and responsibility skills. Employs an agile working methodology. Possesses advanced proficiency in Microsoft Office applications. Exhibits a keen interest in current business trends and technologies, including Electrification, Industry 4.0, and Data Analytics. Maintains a data-oriented mindset with robust problem-solving abilities. Has practical experience in data analysis, particularly with Python libraries for Big Data interpretation. Demonstrates empathy and the ability to develop positive working relationships. Proactive with a customer-focused and quality-oriented approach. Role Location â€¢ EskiÅŸehir and Kocaeli When You Start Your Career In "Ford Otosan"; â€¢ We have hybrid working model and you can enjoy being part of an agile team. â€¢ You'll become a member of KoÃ§ Pension Foundation â€¢ You and your loved ones will enjoy the benefits of KoÃ§Ailem â€¢ You'll choose the side benefits with Flextra The only criterion evaluated in the recruitment and employment is suitability for the job; equal opportunity is provided without any discrimination. What About Us? Ford Otosan, being one of the top three exporting companies in Turkey since 2004, has achieved 12 consecutive years of automotive industry championship and is Turkiye goods product export champion for 8 years in a row. Ford Otosan operates in 4 main centers with its GÃ¶lcÃ¼k and YenikÃ¶y Plants in Kocaeli, EskiÅŸehir Plant in EskiÅŸehir, Sancaktepe R&D Center and Spare Parts Warehouse in Ä°stanbul and Craiova Plant in Romania employs more than 20,000 people. Kocaeli and EskiÅŸehir Plants are listed among Ford's 'Best Vehicle Production Centers' and EskiÅŸehir is the only factory in Turkiye that can produce vehicles, engines, and powertrains in the same center. Ford Otosan, standing out with its sensitivity regarding social responsibilities, also carries out several social responsibility projects in many fields including education, healthcare, culture, arts, and sports on â€œFuture. Nowâ€ vision. Ford Otosan, also carrying out awareness studies on gender equality since 2013 with the understanding of "Equality at Work", became the only automotive and the first and only industrial company from Turkiye to be included in the Bloomberg Gender-Equality Index in 2021. The building blocks of our new corporate culture, which we call â€œDynamic Balanceâ€ , our values are mutual trust and respect, value each other and affection, openness to change and innovation, open and transparent communication. A common culture brings us to a common sense and purpose, helps us to work in a positive atmosphere of trust, ties us closer and helps us to reach a stronger future all together. Show more Show less

Ready to learn more about us? We were founded in 2010 with a dynamic and agile start-up spirit. The trust of around 30 million customers and 250,000 sellers has made us the first decacorn in Turkey. Our success is backed by renowned investors such as Alibaba, General Atlantic, Softbank, Princeville Capital and several sovereign wealth funds. In 2022, we opened our first dedicated international office in Berlin and expanded to Amsterdam, Luxembourg and London. And that's just the beginning! Tech at the root We believe that technology is the driver and e-commerce is the outcome. Thanks to the dedication of our team, we have become one of the top 5 e-commerce companies in EMEA and one of the fastest growing worldwide. We currently deliver over 1.5 million parcels daily to 27 countries. Growth is in our DNA As a young and dynamic company, we are constantly growing and expanding. With Trendyol Tech, one of the leading R&D centres, Trendyol Express, the fastest growing delivery network, Dolap, the largest platform for second-hand goods, and Trendyol Go, our instant food and grocery delivery service, we are gearing up to become the world's leading e-commerce platform. Focused on positive impact Our vision goes beyond business success. We strive to make a sustainable and positive impact on our customers, business partners, and society. By digitizing merchants and SMEs, helping businesses grow, and promoting women's economic empowerment, we are dedicated to creating a better future. ABOUT THE TEAM Who doesnâ€™t love growth? The Growth Team connects people to many categories online with the most innovative marketing strategies. The team also analyzes data to make great decisions in the competitive marketplace through relevant and timely communication with our customers and sellers to maximize their experience. We are all working with the same purpose: To create a positive impact in our ecosystem by enabling commerce through technology. As a CRM Data Analyst at Trendyol, you will play a crucial role in driving the growth of social commerce with our influencer ecosystem and advertising products under the Trendyol Marketing Solutions portfolio. Working closely with cross-functional teams, you will be responsible for analyzing data, identifying growth opportunities, and implementing strategies to enhance influencer & seller adoption, engagement, and overall performance on our platform. Your Main Responsibilities Design segmentation for many different business parties & dimensions (seller, influencer etc. ). Work with the business stakeholders to design and execute growth opportunities for each segment Create and execute personalized communication journeys for influencers, enhancing their experience and fostering long-term engagement and loyalty Conduct in-depth analysis of campaigns to understand their impact on influencers' behavior. Optimize targeting, messaging, and campaign effectiveness to drive better results Develop and maintain performance tracking dashboards to provide real-time insights on key business metrics, performance indicators, and trends. Communicate insights and recommendations to stakeholders across the organization Collaborate with the product team to design and launch innovative advertising products that align with customer needs and business objectives Qualities We Are Looking For Bachelor's or Masterâ€™s Degree from a reputable university preferably in Computer Science, Management Information Systems or Industrial Engineering +2 year experience in data analysis, project & product management Coding skills â€“ ability to code in one or more languages (SQL, Python) Marketing automation tools (ie Salesforce Marketing Cloud) are a plus Familiar with digital analytics tools (ie Google Analytics, Adjust) and visualisation tools (Looker, Tableau, Qlikview etc.) Strong analytical skills and experience of working with large volumes of data Enjoys the challenge of simplifying complex data, processes, and concepts to highlight key insights and guide decision making Communication Skills - Excited to work with different functions within company, creative problem solver who thrives with ambiguity A genuine interest in digital disciplines and stay up to date on trends Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English The experience range for this position is suitable for specialist/senior specialist and executive/manager (non-team management) roles JOIN US AND Take responsibility from day one and develop your skills with a talented and diverse international team. Experience open communication, flexibility, and a start-up spirit in our unique culture. Tackle big challenges in e-commerce with Agile practices and encourage growth by learning from mistakes. Join creative and focused teams that prioritize collaboration and problem-solving. Access our extensive training platform for continuous learning and personal growth. Benefit from the support of a global team of experts with mentoring and professional development opportunities. Focus on talent and potential, not just job titles. Connect with teammates regardless of physical distance through events, meetings, and social activities. Enjoy competitive benefits such as Trendyol shopping budget, central and international office locations, and top-of-the-line technical equipment. We're looking forward to receiving your application! We embrace a hybrid working model that seamlessly blends the best of both worldsâ€”remote productivity and the collaborative energy of our vibrant offices. Every month, we gather at our offices once to work side by side, fostering in person communication and embracing the camaraderie that fuels our team spirit. These sessions are crucial for teamwork in solving complex issues, socializing, learning from each other, and experiencing our culture. Each division has a pre-set optional office day each week. Based on our preferences, we come together at our offices at our discretion as an opportunity to feel more team spirit, immerse in our culture, and familiarize ourselves with our way of workings. We offer the opportunity for a two-month full remote work program, allowing you to work from abroad, during the summer period (July to August). This working model applies to our hybrid job postings; on-site roles require being based in an office work environment. Discover more about our #LifeatTrendyol and our culture on our Website, LinkedIn and YouTube channels. At Trendyol, we believe in the power of an inclusive workplace. We value diversity and believe that every team member contributes to our vibrant culture. Our platform is for everyone, and so is our workplace. We encourage the representation and amplification of diverse voices in our business, as it allows us all to thrive, contribute, and shape the future together. Show more Show less

Kavak is also the first Unicorn Company in the history of Mexico, but it's current value is US$8.7B , that is, almost 9 unicorns together. Our team is the number one priority. Use machine learning to create new, scalable solutions for business problems Design experiments for improved processes and outcomes, measure results and provide data driven proposals in decision-making Work closely with cross-functional teams of commercial teams, skilled engineers and product managers What are we looking for? Basic Qualifications Strong drive to learn, experiment and drive outcomes 2+ years of professional experience performing quantitative analysis Bachelors, Masters or PhD in a quantitative field (e.g. Computer Science, Economics, Statistics) Experience with Python and libraries commonly used for machine learning, such as XGBoost, pandas, numpy Preferred Qualifications Experience in price optimization An advanced degree (Masters, PhD) in a quantitative field (e.g. Computer Science, Economics, Statistics) Experience using AWS or other cloud platforms A consistent record of using data to drive product teams to achieve ambitious goals and influence outcomes Experience in schema design and dimensional data modeling and building data pipelines Do you want to be part of this story? SHEIN is a global fashion and lifestyle e-retailer committed to making the beauty of fashion accessible to all. From our global offices, we reach customers in more than 150 countries. Founded in 2012, SHEIN has nearly 10,000 employees operating from offices around the world. In SHEIN , we work with outstanding, creative, and capable peers. We share an energetic and open culture for capable people to discern, work, and ignite as a team. Develop and maintain standards for data integrity and reporting, fostering a culture of trust in data-driven insights. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand their data needs and provide relevant, well-structured insights to support decision-making. Break down process monitoring indicators and generate comprehensive reports summarizing key findings, trends, and recommendations based on data analysis. Analyze the data and use data visualization tools to identify trends, trajectories, and anomalies that contribute to strategic decision-making. Innovate and provide solutions to enhance data-driven decision-making processes within the product development department. After insights and discoveries from data, coordinate cross-departments to move business optimization forward Strong project management and communication skills to deal with multiple stakeholders Ad-hoc support for emergencies and progress monitoring for key projects. Qualifications Bachelors degree in related departments At least 3 years of experience in BA. ( preferably in e-commerce) Excellent Excel skills. Strong analytical skills, attention to detail, and problem-solving skills Project management and presentation skills Good at team collaboration Fluent in written and oral English. PMP certificates are preferred. What do we offer? Join a globally recognized and well-known company. Travel and meal allowances are provided. Monthly performance bonuses. Annual performance bonuses. Comprehensive private health insurance. Thrive in an innovative work environment. Embrace a dynamic and friendly atmosphere for growth. Show more Show less

Obilet.com, founded in 2012, is an end-to-end travel ticketing application listing hundreds of bus carriers, airlines and ferry companies. Obilet also provides bus operators with a best-in-class Inventory Management System (IMS) in the form of SaaS. Obilet is the indisputable market leader in Turkey across both B2B and B2C segments with 400 bus carriers using its IMS software, 25 million monthly visitors, and 15 million app downloads. Obilet is projected to further strengthen its position among the largest travel ticketing applications globally by mediating more than 40 million ticket sales in 2024. Obilet has expanded its category offerings to include hotel bookings and car rental services, and initiated its international expansion with the aim of achieving one of the largest global market coverage in the industry. Proficient in Power BI (Power Query, modelling, DAX) as mandatory. Proficient in SQL Server query creation, or similar language. MS Suite tools with proficiency in Excel for Data Analysis. Experience in creating insights from large data sets. Knowledge of statistical analysis and machine learning is a plus. 1 year of experience in data analysis, business intelligence, or related field. Strong writing, editing, and communication skills. Ability to analyze data, draw insights, and make data-driven decisions. Familiarity with HTML, CSS, and content management systems (CMS). Who are we? Equinix is the worldâ€™s digital infrastructure companyÂ®, operating over 250 data centersâ€¯across the globe. Digital leaders harness Equinix's trusted platform to bring together and interconnect foundational infrastructure at software speed. Equinix enables organizations to access all the right places, partners and possibilities to scale with agility, speed the launch of digital services, deliver world-class experiences and multiply their value, while supporting their sustainability goals. Joining our operations team means that you will be at the forefront of all we do, maintaining critical facilities infrastructure as part of a close-knit team delivering best-in-class service to our data center customers. We embrace diversity in thought and contribution and are committed to providingâ€¯an equitable work environment that is foundational to our core values as a company and is vital to our success. Datacenter Critical Facilities Engineer Job Summary A Datacenter Critical Facilities Engineer at Equinix is responsible for ensuring the reliability and efficiency of the data center's critical infrastructure, including power distribution, cooling systems, and environmental monitoring. They oversee maintenance, troubleshooting, and repairs to minimize downtime and optimize performance. Additionally, they may be involved in capacity planning and implementing upgrades to support the growing demands of the data center's operations. Responsibilities Facility/Infrastructure Maintenance Performs semi-routine preventative maintenance checks on-site to non-critical, facility components Performs semi-routine repairs, maintenance, and installations to non-critical facility components Monitors the Building Monitoring System (BMS) and responds timely to semi-routine alarms according to standard operating procedures Assists more senior staff in higher facility repairs and corrective maintenance measures Operates plumbing, fire suppression, and safety systems, under the supervision of more senior technical staff Normally follows established procedures on routine work, requires instructions only on new assignments Vendor Support Coordinates with vendors to ensure maintenance activities are carried out as per Equinix's requirements Supports the work order approval process for service providers on routine maintenance work, for tracking: briefing at the start of work, work during the day workday/shift and final review of the work carried out Ensures vendor maintenance activities are carried out as per Equinix's standard operating procedures Site Administration & Incident Support Performs semi-routine site logs for permits, such as Maintenance Operation Protocol (MOPs) and scripts Uses acquired job skills in following operating procedures to support on-site administration Work Orders & Additional Projects Completes semi-routine work requests and circuit installations Follows established procedures with troubleshooting and maintaining office equipment (if necessary); supports auxiliary equipment and machines Assists more senior staff with responding on-site incidents and acts as directed Collaboration Collaborates with others to resolve semi-routine facility incidents Provides assistance to more senior staff on infrastructure projects Informs stakeholders of inventory needs to maintain stock levels of parts and equipment Qualifications You have a vocational or Higher Vocational education qualification in Electrical / Mechanical Engineering Comprehensive knowledge of critical infrastructure i.e. UPS, generator, BMS, chillers, life safety systems You have previous hands-on experience in engineering, 3 years at least, preferably in a critical facility environment You are self-motivated and flexible You have a good level of English, spoken and written Equinix is committed to ensuring that our employment process is open to all individuals, including those with a disability. If you are a qualified candidate and need assistance or an accommodation, please let us know by completing this form. Equinix is an Equal Employment Opportunity and, in the U.S., an Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to unlawful consideration of race, color, religion, creed, national or ethnic origin, ancestry, place of birth, citizenship, sex, pregnancy / childbirth or related medical conditions, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital or domestic partnership status, age, veteran or military status, physical or mental disability, medical condition, genetic information, political / organizational affiliation, status as a victim or family member of a victim of crime or abuse, or any other status protected by applicable law. Spektra Games is a mobile mid-core games developer & publisher based in Istanbul, Turkey. Our mission is to create the highest quality car games supported by a strong community. Over 50 million players have played our games and new projects are on the way. Working at Spektra Games You will be a part of our talented team and take an active role in the companyâ€™s future to make Spektra the genre-defining studio around the globe. Our teams have the independence to take on creative & technical challenges along the way while having fun. Growth Manager Main Responsibilities: Manage and optimize user acquisition campaigns across various channels (such as Meta, TikTok, Applovin, Unity), including search, and ad networks with data-driven decisions. Develop and implement comprehensive growth strategies to acquire and retain players, with a strong focus on data-driven decision-making. Collaborate with the Creative team to provide KPI insights for generating new advertising content, and take active responsibility in finding new creative ideas. Accepted Locations We are accepting applicants from Turkey, Egypt, and several other countries in the region. For the full list of accepted locations click here . This work is 100% remote. Loom Video Our Founder/CEO, Gabe Greenberg , created a more in depth Loom video that we highly recommend you watch! Check it out here: https://www.loom.com/share/5a8972c7fbbf46aaa3f389b2b6391c40 Overview Youâ€™ll join an expert annotation team to create training data for for the worlds most advanced AI models. No previous AI experience is necessary. You'll get your foot in the door with one of the biggest players in the AI/LLM space today. We are seeking software engineers with 3+ years of experience to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. We currently have 200+ roles open! What Will I Be Doing? Evaluating the quality of AI-generated code, including human-readable summaries of your rationale Solve coding problems, writing functional and efficient code Writing robust test cases to confirm code works efficiently and effectively We asked the technical project manager to go into even more detail and this is how he answered: It is solving coding challenges, creating instructions to help others, reviewing the code before it goes into the model, and there's a ton of variety in the projects. We have everything from "which piece of Python code is better?" to "make a full mobile application using this chatbot, and improve the chatbot's responses afterwards to make it faster" Pay Rates Egypt - 22.05 USD /hr All Non-US Countries - 35 USD /hr Expectations are 15+ hours per week however there is no upper limit. We have engineers working 20-40 hrs per week and some that are working 40+ hours per week. You can work as much as you want to. You'll get paid on a weekly basis. You get paid per hour of work done on the platform. Contract Length Long term, there is no end date. They expect to have work for the next 2 years. You can end the contract at any time. Our hope is that you would commit to 12 months of work, but if you start and it's not a fit for you, we totally understand. Flexible Schedules Developers can set their own hours - ideal candidates will be interested in spending 40 hours a week. They will be with teams, so strong performers will adapt to the urgency of projects and stay engaged, but incredibly flexible on working hours. Take a 3 hour lunch, no problem. You are paid according to time spent on the platform , which is calculated in the coding exercises, as opposed to tracking your own hours. Interview Process Apply using this Ashby form. If you look like a good fit, we'll send an async RLHF code review that will take 35 minutes and would need to be finished within 72 hours of us sending it. You'll receive credentials to the RLHF platform. We'll setup a group call to answer further questions about onboarding with the company. You'll perform a simulated production level task RLHF task on the platform. This will be your final interview and will ultimately determine your employment and leveling. Tech Stack Priorities The current priority for this team is engineers with either a Data Science background that know Python well or software engineers that are well versed with Python. Required Qualifications: 3+ years of experience in a software engineering/software development role. Complete fluency in the English language. Ability to articulate complex scientific concepts clearly and engagingly. Excellent attention to detail and ability to maintain consistency in writing. Solid understanding of grammar, punctuation, and style guidelines. Proficiency with Python Nice To Have's: Bachelor's and/or Masterâ€™s degree in Computer Science Proficiency in working with one or more of the following: Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, C++. SQL, Swift, Ruby, Rust, Go, NET, Matlab, PHP, HTML, DART, R, Apex, and Shell, C, C# Recognized accomplishments or contributions to the coding community or in projects. Proven analytical skills with an ability to approach problems creatively. Adept communication skills, especially when it comes to understanding and discussing project requirements. A commitment to continuous learning, and staying updated with the latest in coding advancements and best practices. Enthusiasm for teaching AI models and experience with technical writing! If so, we are hiring for a Guide Community Specialist at ToursByLocals in Eastern Europe. This is a full-time remote contract position, based out of Eastern Europe and compensation is paid in Euro monthly. As a contractor, you are responsible for ensuring you have the authorization to work in your country and will be responsible for complying with local tax regulations at your own expense. As a Guide Community Specialist at ToursByLocals, your mission is to build strong relationships with guides and help them grow their bookings and offerings. Reporting to the Team Lead, you'll analyze market trends and develop strategies to help guides in Asia convert inquiries into bookings. This role requires a deep understanding of tourism trends, market insights, and regional data. Company Description Recordly.ai is a pioneering audio and video intelligence platform that revolutionizes the way audio intelligence and AI technology are managed. As the world's first unified solution, we have been recognized as the Best Product at #ETLVegas2024 and #NABShow2024. Our dedicated team of experts in artificial intelligence and machine learning are committed to empowering individuals and businesses across various industries by providing cutting-edge solutions that enhance efficiency and accessibility. Our mission is to bridge the gap between spoken content and understanding, enabling seamless transcription, translation, and captioning of audiovisual materials. Role Description This is a full-time remote role for a Product Manager at Recordly as a Product Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing the development and management of our audio and video intelligence platform. Your day-to-day tasks will include defining product requirements, conducting market research, collaborating with cross-functional teams, developing product roadmaps, and ensuring the successful delivery of our solutions. You will play a critical role in shaping the future of our platform and driving its success in the market. Qualifications Strong passion for and understanding of AI technology and audio intelligence Experience in product management ( min. 2 years ), including defining product requirements and developing roadmaps Knowledge of the audiovisual industry and emerging trends Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams Experience in conducting market research and gathering customer insights Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills Strong written and verbal communication skills Ability to work independently and remotely Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field Note: Knowledge of transcription, translation, and captioning technologies would be beneficial. What We Offer: Competitive salary and equity options. (USD based) Stock options. Health, dental, and vision insurance. Paid time off and holidays. Professional development opportunities. Dynamic and inclusive company culture. Collaborative and supportive team environment. Gym Membership: Stay fit and healthy with access to top-notch gym facilities. Netflix Subscription: Enjoy unlimited streaming of your favorite shows and movies. Spotify Membership: Listen to millions of songs and podcasts without ads. We are looking for AI Hunters who are passionate about driving product innovation and excellence. Join us now! Show more Show less

About Us SnA is a business analytics consultancy with its resources actively engaged in client deliverables. SnA helps blue-chip clients in Banking, Insurance, Telco, Retail, and Energy understand their transaction-level history & conduct predictive analysis. SnA team combines skillsets in three key areas: business strategy, applied statistics, and database techniques. In the past fifteen years, SnA has completed over 200+ advanced analytics engagements with high-profile clients in the EMEA region. This position requires a combination of technical skills and research, communication, and presentation skills. We seek highly motivated individuals with a strong record of professional/academic/personal achievement and place significant importance on personal qualities such as intellectual curiosity, responsibility, determination, creativity, flexibility, drive, and self-confidence. ABOUT CODEWAY Codeway was founded in 2020 with a vision of turning strong ideas into sector-leading mobile products. Today, Codeway is a thriving tech company with multiple sector-leading apps, and is home to 200+ bright & curious minds in Istanbul, Turkey. We create mobile applications that millions of users love. We curate bold ideas and transform them into fast-growing products - from concept, through development, up to global market expansion. Our products have reached over 150 million users across 160 countries in six continents- and weâ€™re just getting started. If youâ€™re passionate about mobile apps and want to be part of a long-term project, join us and let's build the future together. POSITION Bring your passion for AI and take Codeway as your play-ground. Youâ€™ll get all the support to improve your skills and build the best AI products the mobile industry has ever seen. Your work will immediately impact millions, practically! Youâ€™ll join a passionate team of individuals who are on a mission to shape the future of AI-powered products. Youâ€™ll deep dive into cutting-edge technologies, work with the best researchers in the field, and help build better products. ** Remote work is available for this position. Besides preparing analytic reports with large data, GLMs and Machine learning models, we collaborate closely with marketing, claims, IT and operations to provide our customers with the best customer experience possible. We are looking for a Junior Pricing Specialist to help us move forward. What you'll do, Become an owner and expert on our Traffic / Casco insurance tariffs, Identify areas for pricing and underwriting action based on ongoing monitoring of results, Preparing data and building machine learning and GLM models, Implemented tariff actions and model results to the system. WHO ARE WE? Everywhere is Domino's for us, everything is together for us! Our story started in 1996 with our first branch opened in Ulus, Istanbul. As the pioneer of Turkey's quick service restaurant chains, we combined the home delivery concept with pizza. This merger also ignited our spirit of innovation, which keeps our energy high. As extraordinary, passionate and enterprising Domino's employees, we are careful to do our job in the best possible way. Today, as an industry leading brand for 28 years, we have achieved this thanks to the Domino's team of more than 7,500 people. We have 700 restaurants in 80 provinces in Turkey and production centers in Ankara, Gaziantep, Gebze and Izmir. These numbers are increasing even as you read this article! We are proud to be a brand that makes a splash with its success not only in Turkey but also in the world! We run a total of 809 restaurants under the umbrella of DP Eurasia, including Azerbaijan and Georgia, with our perfect operational perspective, and deliver our delicacies in less than 30 minutes. In addition to being one of the most popular restaurant chains, we are also breaking new ground: As the DP Eurasia brand, which was born in Turkey and grew with its support offices and franchises, our happiness is indescribable as the first Turkish company to enter the London Stock Exchange from the Premium list in 2017. Another innovation of ours is; COFFY, our one-price coffee point with an innovative approach compatible with the digital world! We continue this story, which we started in Istanbul KadÄ±kÃ¶y in 2019, with 92 stores in Turkey today. We make a difference in all the work we do with our extraordinary spirit. We say that we are a technology company that sells food, not just pizza. We also achieve high satisfaction rates with our technology investments and digital initiatives. We continue to walk passionately on our path to many successes. We believe that there is no other flavor that makes you happy faster than Domino's. Because our taste is unique and inimitable. Canonical is a leading provider of open source software and operating systems to the global enterprise and technology markets. Our platform, Ubuntu, is very widely used in breakthrough enterprise initiatives such as public cloud, data science, AI, engineering innovation and IoT. Our customers include the world's leading public cloud and silicon providers, and industry leaders in many sectors. The company is a pioneer of global distributed collaboration, with 1000+ colleagues in 70+ countries and very few roles based in offices. Teams meet two to four times yearly in person, in interesting locations around the world, to align on strategy and execution. The company is founder led, profitable and growing. We are hiring Python and Kubernetes Specialist Engineers focused on Data, AI/ML and Analytics Solutions to join our teams building open source solutions for public cloud and private infrastructure. As a software engineer on the team, you'll collaborate on an end-to-end data analytics and mlops solution composed of popular, open-source, machine learning tools, such as Kubeflow, MLFlow, DVC, and Feast. You may also work on workflow, ETL, data governance and visualization tools like Apache SuperSet, dbt, and Temporal, or data warehouse solutions such as Apache Trino, or ClickHouse. Your team will own a solution from the analytics and machine learning space, and integrate with the solutions from other teams to build the world's best end-to-end data platform. These solutions may be run on servers or on the cloud, on machines or on Kubernetes, on developer desktops, or as web services. We serve the needs of individuals and community members as much as the needs of our Global 2000 and Fortune 500 customers; we make our primary work available free of charge and our Pro subscriptions are also available to individuals for personal use at no cost. Our goal is to enable more people to enjoy the benefits of open source, regardless of their circumstances. Location: This initiative spans many teams that are home-based in EMEA, Americas and APAC time zones, so we can accommodate candidates in almost any location. We believe in distributed collaboration but we also try to ensure that colleagues have company during their work hourse! Successful candidates will join a team where most members and your manager are broadly in the same time zone so that you have the benefits of constant collaboration and discussion. What your day will look like Develop your understanding of the entire Linux stack, from kernel, networking, and storage, to the application layer Design, build and maintain solutions that will be deployed on public and private clouds and local workstations Master distributed systems concepts such as observability, identity, tracing Work with both Kubernetes and machine-oriented open source applications Collaborate proactively with a distributed team of engineers, designers and product managers Debug issues and interact in public with upstream and Ubuntu communities Generate and discuss ideas, and collaborate on finding good solutions What we are looking for in you Professional or academic software delivery using Python or Golang Exceptional academic track record from both high school and university Undergraduate degree in a technical subject or a compelling narrative about your alternative chosen path Confidence to respectfully speak up, exchange feedback, and share ideas without hesitation Track record of going above-and-beyond expectations to achieve outstanding results Passion for technology evidenced by personal projects and initiatives The work ethic and confidence to shine alongside motivated colleagues Professional written and spoken English with excellent presentation skills Experience with Linux (Debian or Ubuntu preferred) Excellent interpersonal skills, curiosity, flexibility, and accountability Appreciative of diversity, polite and effective in a multi-cultural, multi-national organisation Thoughtfulness and self-motivation Result-oriented, with a personal drive to meet commitments Ability to travel twice a year, for company events up to two weeks long Additional Skills That Would Be Nice To Have The following skills may be helpful to you in the role, but we don't expect everyone to bring all of them. Hands-on experience with machine learning libraries, or tools. Proven track record of building highly automated machine learning solutions for the cloud. Experience with container technologies (Docker, LXD, Kubernetes, etc.) Experience with public clouds (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) Working knowledge of cloud computing Passionate about software quality and testing Experience working on an open source project What we offer colleagues We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognise outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus or commission. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally. Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year Annual compensation review Recognition rewards Annual holiday leave Maternity and paternity leave Employee Assistance Programme Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues Priority Pass, and travel upgrades for long haul company events About Canonical Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world of software. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Most colleagues at Canonical have worked from home since its inception in 2004. Working here is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game. Canonical is an equal opportunity employer We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration. We are Pegasus Airlines! We are Pegasus. We represent the new generation in Turkish aviation. With our motto: Everyone has the right to fly, we inspire our guests to travel with low fares thanks to our business model. As your digital airline, our guest-centric approach offers digital technologies and unique innovations that enhance the travel experience. Today, we operate connecting flights to more than 50 countries across TÃ¼rkiye, Europe, North Africa, the Middle East, Russia, and Central Asia. We have one of the youngest fleets in Turkey, which exceeds 100 aircraft in 2024. Are you ready to embark on your Pegasus career path as our Senior Data Scientist - Revenue Management, flight number PC-2024? Requirements University degree in a highly quantitative field such as Computer Engineering, CTIS, Statistics, Mathematics, or any other Engineering Sciences Minimum 4 years of experience, preferably specializing in the field of pricing and revenue management Proficiency in PL-SQL database programming language and ability to write code from scratch. Proficiency in ETL and Oracle DWH concepts Advanced knowledge of train-test split (train-val-oot concepts, sliding window ,cross validation..etc), data leakage, and feature selection concepts Knowledge and experience with model explainability libraries such as SHAP, Shapash, etc. Experience in Python and the most common data manipulation and data science packages (e.g., Pandas, Numpy, SKLearn, etc.) Experience with common machine learning techniques (e.g., Random Forest, LightGBM, decision trees, etc.), predictive modeling, hyperparameter tuning, and cross-validation Advanced knowledge of model evaluation metrics: F1, Precision, Recall, Accuracy for classification problems, and MAE, MAPE, MSE, R2 for regression problems Knowledge of genetic algorithm is a plus Demonstrated problem-solving skills, ability to multi-task, and set priorities Strong analytical mindset with attention to detail, focusing on both technical and business aspects Fluent in both written and spoken English Good communication skills In this role you will Create data pipelines that prepare the base population for models and several input tables containing different types of features. Finally, combine all steps to create model data. Develop python scripts that efficiently handle multiple models (e.g., 60 different models). Think that these models belong to the same project but have different bases. Create complex machine learning models, including stacking ensembles and grid search concepts. Use Python to create feature engineering steps such as feature selection for stability and explainability analysis. For feature selection, use methods such as correlation elimination, unigini-uniR elimination, and PSI elimination. Evaluate machine learning models with appropriate metrics and monitor the models deployed in production based on performance metrics. Create Python scripts that perform data quality checks for model inputs. Maintain and improve in-house pricing tools, including seasonal setup and daily/weekly production of input and output tables (e.g., elasticity coefficients, booking reference curves, etc.) Analyze the effectiveness of algorithms and improve them based on business strategy, market competition, and feedback from the revenue management team. Propose ideas to improve and optimize the algorithms and models used by the tools. What Pegasus Airlines can offer you Discounted domestic and international flight tickets that includes first-degree family members, For single candidate can add +1 person, Discounted flight with contracted airlines to destinations where there are no flights Private health insurance Food voucher Remote and flexible working hours on certain days according to working model, allowance for remote working days Fun@Fly Social Activity Clubs (Social clubs such as theatre club, sailing, trekking, running, basketball , volleyball and football teams, e-sports team) Fitness center Kindergarten opportunity for female employees (Istanbul, Izmir, Antalya) Performance based bonus system Shuttle Discover Pegasus Airlines! Our Framework for a Sustainable Future prioritises our impact on the environment and society, as well as economic development. We call our route Sustainable Future . By 2050, we aim to eliminate carbon emissions from our operations, and we are working towards this goal. We are proud of a rich governance culture that is developed through a perspective open to continuous improvement and the feedback of our stakeholders. We regularly and transparently share our targets and performance on these issues with the public. Gender equality is at the foundation of our corporate culture. We are one of the pioneering airlines that have signed IATA's voluntary initiative "25by2025" to increase the representation of women in all areas of the aviation industry, including pilot, technician and management ranks. We were the first airline in the world to join the UN Women's Empowerment Principles (WEPs) platform.
